properties.name: Stanley, Falkland Islands
properties.description: Chief port and town of the Falkland Islands
properties.abs: Stanley is the capital of the Falkland Islands. It is located on the island of East Falkland, on a north-facing slope in one of the wettest parts of the islands. At the 2016 census, the town had a population of 2,460. The entire population of the Falkland Islands was 3,398 on Census Day on 9 October 2016.
properties.abs_chn: 史丹利，又称史丹利港，阿根廷称阿根廷港，是福克兰群岛的首府和唯一城市。史丹利港位于东福克兰岛（阿根廷称索莱达岛）一个北向的山坡上，面向港湾，2012年人口2121。
